commitMessage:
@@@Rename sharding-proxy to shardingsphere-proxy (#5645)

* Rename sharding-proxy to shardingsphere-proxy

* rename org.apache.shardingsphere.shardingproxy to org.apache.shardingsphere.proxy

@@@Refactor ConnectionStatusHandler (#7392)

* Rename ConnectionStateHandler to ConnectionStatusHandler

* Rename ConnectionStatusHandler.changeRunningStatusIfNecessary

* Remove ConnectionStatusHandler.getStatus

* Rename statusHandler

* Rename resourceLock.doAwait()

* Refactor BackendConnection

* Merge ConnectionStatus.INIT and TERMINATED to READY

@@@Rename to ConnectionStatusManager (#7424)

* Refactor ConnectionStatusHandler

* Rename ConnectionStatusManager

* Move ConnectionStatus to status package

@@@Use TransactionStatus to decouple transaction and ConnectionStatus (#7428)

* Add transaction package

* Use TransactionStatus to decouple transaction and ConnectionStatus
